DOC.brief_summary: A pilot study Dextran-40 infusion patient decompensated cirrhosis presenting AKI
DOC.brief_title: Dextran , Plasma Expander , Offers New Hope Patients With Decompensated Liver Cirrhosis Acute Kidney Injury
DOC.detailed_description: A pilot study Dextran-40 infusion decompensated cirrhotic patient complicate AKI . Dextran-40Â® administer 1 g/kg/day two day . AKI reversal define serum creatinine < 1.5 mg/dL . Albumin infusion give AKI reversal occur .
DOC.criteria: Decompensated cirrhosis acute kidney injury Ager 18 year old Having chronic kidney disease , severe heart lung disease , severe sepsis Pregnant Receiving nephrotoxic agent Having history allergic Dextran
